name: Ice Queen Makeover - Frozen Salon Girls Games
name_original: Ice Queen Makeover - Frozen Salon Girls Games
description:
Help to Ice Queen girl to look beauty with new fashion stylist.Ice Queen salon present Ice Queen makeup and costume. Every Ice Queen princess doll want to look like bridal fashion girls in her own icy theme wedding.

This is the latest 2D game for the girl age between 5 to 8 years old to play. You can freely imagine and create beautiful Ice Queen. This game is wonderful romantic and unforgettable ice. It has very stunning jewellery, beautiful dresses; here can do hair color and the best in Ice Kingdom.Enjoy unlimited fun with the Super luxurious indian makeup and other western dresses as well.

Game Features:-
 - Spa Section 
- Makeup Section
 - Dress up Section
-Different hair style to choose  - Experiment with dozens of different lipsticks, eyes, eye-shadow, hair color and much more. 
- Lots of Dresses for the best day. 
- Huge amount of variety of party items, including earrings, necklaces and head begs,shoes.
 - Makeup and Dress up her in the grow of your dreams of ice Queen Lots of beautiful items

Ice Queen Spa Salon:-

  Used To go to the spa for the ice that make her fresh, beautiful and charming. Use Different Mask to make girl more attractive and charming and don't forgot to use shower for her mask. Lemon That are used to make Ice girl’s eyes fresh and relax.  Remove The Pimple from The bride’s face.

Ice Queen Makeup:-

 You can use stylish Queen makeup for the Ice to prepare for her makeover.Use The Makeup that makes Ice angel more beautiful and attractive.

Ice Queen DressUp:-

 You can Design the Dress for best couple to look different from all in Ice Games You got a change to select Queen dress,neckless,shoes,purse,eye color,eye brow etc.. dressUp your Queen like never before and make her most stunning and share your experience with your friends too.

Join Ice Queen Open the game, and click PLAY to start. Hurrah~
